page.title: 12INDUSTRY IN WIGAN
page.content: In our part of Wigan there are many {factories}and{warehouses.}We saw some when we were on a walk and others from the barge "Kittywake" on the Leeds - Liverpool Canal. Some of the firms we saw included Gridweld, who make metal mesh; Great Universal Stores, a mail order firm; Wigan Newspapers; Magnet Southern, timber suppliers; Greens Carpets; Mayalls, paint and decoration suppliers and Walmsleys, paper-making machinery works (now closed). We went into the{Gridweld}factory where lots of people were making {metal mesh.}Metal strips are welded together and used for fencing football grounds or just in the garden. Big machines do all the work. They coil the steel up, weld it, press it and put it into rolls. Then it is sold and delivered in different sizes.
